website_summaries.verdict: The perfect bag for carrying not only your Xbox but also your games, controllers, and accessories.
pros: The disc pockets mean you can leave your bulky cases behind, and there's plenty of room for 2 controllers
The compartments keep everything well-organized, and the large compartment fits any Xbox model
cons: This case could use a bit more padding

website_summaries.verdict: A roomy case that can store most consoles as well as controllers, cables, and games.
pros: With nylon fabric and protective padding, this case is a good option for Xbox and PS4 owners
Customers love the modular compartments and the extra room to store accessories
cons: The corners of your console may poke out from this case

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, a little pricy for what u get!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good case for my xbox 1. As you know there are very few out there. I was able to fit the power cord, hdmi cord, 4 games in their cases ( i was not going to trust the disk sleeves to hold my game), 2 controllers, and the xbox1 itself. The construction is fare, not as durable as i thought it would be. I had to rearrange the dividers that came with if for the storage of games, ect.works best when the case is on its side so that the xbox1 isn't pouting pressure on the storage underneath. as of right now i would buy it again unless something better more rugged comes out.
customer_reviews.author: Max Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Hyperkin Xbox One Case Rocks!!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding Case with good design and excellent protection. Able to store Console, Kinect, Media Remote, Controller, Power Adapter, extra Batteries with charging cables and Headset. These pictures speak for themselves. :-) \m/
customer_reviews.author: Species8472XGN

customer_reviews.title: Good case if you travel with your Xbox One
customer_reviews.text: Very good bag for people that take their Xbox One on the road. I usually do business travel with my Xbox and found this case to be very useful, it has room for 2 controllers, the Xbox, the power supply, a small external HHD, cables and even has slots for some games. Here is the con: Flimsy slot for the games, I don't use those slots. There is no room for larger headsets that most gamers use. The case uses odd Velcro straps to hold the Xbox in place if feels flimsy but it is secure.
customer_reviews.author: CFGamble

customer_reviews.title: ... for this travel carrying case that allows him to easily pack up and go to his Dad's house
customer_reviews.text: My Son was soooo excited for this travel carrying case that allows him to easily pack up and go to his Dad's house. LOVE IT! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mi-CheleLynette

customer_reviews.title: Comes Open as Walking
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this, but I don’t. It stores and protects my son’s Xbox One to an extent while he is traveling, but even after securing all the Velcro and snaps, it still comes open as we are walking through the airport. We are not going to invest the money into another, but we will have to tie string around this to prevent it from opening and falling out as we are trying to juggle all the luggage in the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Graham

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a Piece of garbage this thing is!!! First of all you have to take your games out of the case and store them in this "Flap" that rests on top of the XBOX, every single time, WITHOUT FAIL, they get loose and flop around begging to be scratched. They simply do not secure the games and is the worst thing possible. Even if by some miracle they stay in their "Flap" when you open the bag they fly all over the place. It's so upsetting. The bag ripped with only a week of daily use so it's sewed together really cheap. This is a flawed design and simply does not work well. Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Matt James

customer_reviews.title: Solid case for anyone who who travels with their Xbox
customer_reviews.text: This is one awesome travel case. The rubber padding is perfect for the console and the felt lining keeps the accessories safe in transit. There is plenty of room in the bottom section for controllers and cords. The space for the console is well protected and the velcro latch makes it easy to remove for setup. When everything is packed up, you really feel that your equipment is safe. To top everything off it looks pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great if you travel with your Xbox.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sibling who goes back and forth between parents and happy with it. You can organize the bottom compartment however you like which is great. Fits the power cable, HDMI, a controller, and you can even squeeze a pair of headphones in there. I wish the shoulder strap would be removed, but that’s the only negative about this case.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Awkwardly small and not very durable
customer_reviews.text: There’s just enough room for the console, one controller, awkwardly stowed power plugs, an HDMI cable, and a few bare discs. After 3 months the sides of the bag split rendering it useless. If you don’t use it a whole lot then I guess it’s a decent bag, but for the frequent traveler it won’t last very long. Fortunately there are larger and more durable carrying cases for consoles, and I recommend trying others.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Case for My Son!
customer_reviews.text: My son and his friend travels back and forth to each other's houses with their x-box so I bought this for him and his friend. This case is ideal EXCEPT it doesn't have a place for his head phones and he has to loop them through the strap. That's the only thing that kept me from giving it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Reid

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Good buy. Good for traveling originally got this for my brother's Xbox One, but also works for ps4. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: More than we expected. I saw a review on here about seone not being able to get their kinect to fit into the case, so we were surprised when we were able to fit everything and more in. I will say we don't have an abundance of games, but everything fit very nicely. Also feels very secure, which is great for us because we are moving to Japan.
customer_reviews.author: LaKeisha

customer_reviews.title: It did the trick when I moved to a new ...
customer_reviews.text: It did the trick when I moved to a new state. I wish it would have held my headphones but they were too big. I also couldn'tput any games in it which was a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara krill

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: So.........I love this carrying case! Just purchased a xbox one x and needed something secure and comfortable. Wasnt sure about it at first, but once I started using it it fits everything perfectly. Games, wires, controllers and game console fits great. Good investment!
customer_reviews.author: Therasas Kahr

customer_reviews.title: Condenses the amount of stuff I have to carry around ...
customer_reviews.text: Condenses the amount of stuff I have to carry around for my 1S. I will admit that padding around the corners of your console have much to be desired. Perhaps, adding in some additional padding for transport is in order. Otherwise, at least the pockets underneath hold all of the wires and controllers really well.
customer_reviews.author: rsxsgirl24

customer_reviews.title: it's easy peasy. I'd recommend this product to anyone with ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother, he loves it! Uses it almost every weekend. It holds his gaming console, controller and whatever games he wants to take. The whole set up takes a minute to figure out at first but once you get the hang of it, it's easy peasy. I'd recommend this product to anyone with the xBoxOne that's planning on taking it anywhere. Bottom line, it's durable and can hold all your junk! ha
customer_reviews.author: MoriarTEA

customer_reviews.title: This was a perfect case to carry an xbox to a friends house
customer_reviews.text: looked everywhere for a case. This was a perfect case to carry an xbox to a friends house. Would highly suggest it to anyone that carries there xbox back and forth
customer_reviews.author: af

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Not worth 40 bucks should have sold it at 20.00 very flimsy i will never buy any products from them again

customer_reviews.title: Used to travel on plane 3 times since purchase.  Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. My Xbox One X actually fits inside it better due to it being smaller than original Xbox One. Original fit but it took up every square inch of space.

customer_reviews.title: The best bag ever.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love's it. I wish i would have known about this bag early . It helps her game to stay in place and safe to move it where ever she go when we are traveling.

customer_reviews.text: I had no issues with this bag / sturdy and easy for my son to pack up his Xbox

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever. My son travels a bit so this item was worth my money and keeps his Xbox safe.

customer_reviews.text: I love this bag in a lot of ways but the two downsides that I can see are the corners are exposed a bit and the sides are just velcrow I would rather buckles personally but that helps save space .

customer_reviews.title: he was super excited about not having to use a paper bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend, he was super excited about not having to use a paper bag to transport his Xbox. The case works perfectly for him. His Xbox and the extra hard drive fits just right.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: The velcro strap that holds the main compartment closed ripped completely off and caused our xbox to fall on the floor. This was after about 3 users. Thankfully, the xbox is ok, but I'm out of my return window by just a few days... not recommended at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tripod Tactical

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we had in mind.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. Not extra sturdy but a great deal. Recommended indeed!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag! with a ton of velcro! lol
customer_reviews.text: This is a great carry bag for all the xbox accessories and the console! *note you have to use all the velcro on the bag to securely strap everything down so nothing gets scratched.

customer_reviews.title: Broken Straps
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy straps apart when we opened it. Would of returned it but just sewed it back together we couldn’t wait for replacement

customer_reviews.title: Not Enough Storage Room
customer_reviews.text: It beats putting your Xbox in a regular backpack or bag but it really doesn't have enough storage room for everything you need. There's not enough room for my Kinect. Also the compartments for your games doesn't really secur your disc. They slide out depending on how you hold it. And it's a possibility that your cords may scratch your games. In conclusion it's better than nothing.

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Great case it you plan on taking your Xbox one places. I don't like the disk holder so I don't use them other then that I would buy it again if I need to

customer_reviews.text: I thought I was going to like it. Its smaller then I thought it was. I was expecting to be able to carry and fit more accessories. The main issue is when you carry it, the case is only held together by 2 clip if they disconnect or come apart, the bag is worthless. customer_reviews.title: This thing is terrible. You can barely fit the cords in it
customer_reviews.text: My brother got this for his Xbox One. He had it shipped to the house so I was the one that had to put the Xbox One in there. This thing is terrible. You can barely fit the cords in it, the disc holders are a terrible idea, its very difficult to get the console in there with the cords. I recommend finding something better. Hell, an Xbox 360 case might work. Might. Don't take my word for it on that. Though this case is downright terrible. Plus like everyone has been saying the corners of the console are not protected.

customer_reviews.title: Body armor for your Xbox!!!

Note: I have not yet put my xbox one in it but its dimensions indicate it won't be a problem.

I still wrap the console in a pillowcase for now- it's not built to be ultra protective which is fine with me. I'm gonna put together a thin microfiber foam case for the console to fit around it while it's inside, just to add a little peace of mind. Would definitely recommend this to anymore looking for an xbox one carrying case.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact and fits everything he needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the boyfriend and he likes it very much. Nice and compact and fits everything he needs. Nice colors also. He travel a lot for work and this was the perfect solution for his travelling needs. He is picky when it comes to his electronics so this must be a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Some internals could be heavier, but it does what I wanted it to do: Transport and protect an Xbox and it's accessories.
customer_reviews.text: Similar to other reviews, It'd be nice if the internal (green) padding dividers were a little heavier or thicker, but it definitely serves it's purpose well. I have no doubt with everything in it's place that the contents are protected and the bag carries and transports well. Much better than throwing everything into a backpack. The lower portion can be arranged to specifically hold the power supply and its cord, and two controllers and a couple accessories. I've seen pictures showing discs inside, but I feel more comfortable with those in their original case or a CD-type book holder with it's own rigid cover..
customer_reviews.author: william boelke

product_meta.title: Hyperkin Polygon "The Rook" Travel Bag for Xbox One
product_meta.description: Every journey begins with a single step: packing your Xbox One. Brave the elements with The Rook, a carrying case made with extra protective foam padding, durable nylon fabric, and modular compartments. The Rook includes storage for your console, six discs, controllers, cables, and whatever else you want to bring along. There is also a 4ft adjustable shoulder strap so you can take your Xbox One, Xbox One S, or Xbox One X on any kind of trek. Wherever your travels take you, gaming awaits.
feature_bullets: Secures via two heavy duty clips and Velcro
